title: Where Do We Go From Here?
description:
Eric's son picked a fight at a family function while high on drugs, leaving Eric at a loss to how to handle future interactions. - Dr. Laura: "He should be clean and sober for 6 months before being invited around family."

Has your family struggled with a member who's an addict? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
